DOC.brief_summary: Comfort is compared between two allergy drops
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Tolerability Between Two Allergy Drops
DOC.criteria: Between the ages of 18 and over inclusive. Males or females Patient is in generally good & stable overall health. Patient likely to comply with study guidelines & study visits. Informed consent signed. History of allergic conjunctivitis Current symptoms of allergic conjunctivitis assessed by the investigator Corneal refractive surgery or contact lens wear within 6 months of this study. Current use of Restasis Intraocular surgery within 6 months or ocular laser surgery within 6 months. Pregnant or lactating women. Ocular pathology (includes glaucoma and cataract), which could impact results and/or place patient at risk.
